channel.title: Player "_"?
channel.description:
Yeah, when I try to connect to my server, using a "multi-server" client... The character file is saved, but not for the username which I create. :S The client recieves an "Invalid username or password" error.
So far, I've tried with a Project16 V.6 source and a Testscape source (both have credits given to the creators).
Quoting the server... One moment ;)
[Quote=Server]Starting [server blanked out] Server on 0.0.0.0:43594 ClientHandler: Accepted from 127.0.0.1:49517 Client type: high memory version UserId: 66182427 George has signed onto server. Game saved for player _ ClientHandler: Client _ disconnected.[/Quote]

item.title: Player "_"?
item.dc:creator: @ServerMuncher ServerMuncher
item.description:
@ServerMuncher wrote:

Fixed it Had one of those flukey moments. Completely wiped my saved games folder and I was able to connect again

Read full topic

item.title: Player "_"?
item.dc:creator: @ServerMuncher ServerMuncher
item.description:
@ServerMuncher wrote:

Ah, guess I overlooked that :P. Thanks

Read full topic

item.title: Player "_"?

item.description:
@ServerMuncher wrote:

Yeah, when I try to connect to my server, using a “multi-server” client… The character file is saved, but not for the username which I create. :S The client recieves an “Invalid username or password” error.

So far, I’ve tried with a Project16 V.6 source and a Testscape source (both have credits given to the creators).

Quoting the server… One moment

[Quote=Server]Starting [server blanked out] Server on 0.0.0.0:43594
ClientHandler: Accepted from 127.0.0.1:49517
Client type: high memory version
UserId: 66182427
George has signed onto server.
Game saved for player _
ClientHandler: Client _ disconnected.[/Quote]
